page.title: 09RIDING LESSONS IN PENNARD.
page.content: THERE ARE HORSE_RIDING CENTRES IN THE AREA.SOME GIVE LESSONS AND OTHERS TAKE RIDERS INTO THE BEAUTIFUL COUNTRYSIDE. ON SATURDAY MORNING I WAKE UP AT 8.30 TO GET READY FOR RIDING. I PUT ON MY JODPURS,JUMPERS AND TEESHIRT.I THEN GO DOWN STAIRS AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST. AFTER BREAKFAST I WASH MYSELF.THEN PUT MY BODY_WARMER,BOOTS AND I GET MY WHIP AND HAT.THEN I GET INTO THE CAR,AND MY FATHER DRIVES ME TO MRS ENGLANDS ON THE CLIFFS. WHEN I AM THERE I GIVE IN MY MONEY AND GET MY HORSE OUT.I FETCH THE BRIDLE AND SADDLE FROM THE TACK ROOM AND TAKE THEM TO MY HORSE TO PUT ON HIM BEFORE WE GO OUT RIDING. I USUALLY RIDE COCOA WHO IS WHITE. SOMETIMES I RIDE BRANDY WHO IS BROWN. THEN I MOUNT. SOMETIMES WE PRACTICE TROTTING, CANTERING AND JUMPING OVER SMALL FENCES. OTHER TIMES WE GO TO POBBLES BAY OR OVER THE CLIFFS.
